title: Ukrainian military had 61 combat engagements with Russian forces near Terny of Donetsk region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk region,...
content: UKRANIAN MILITARY HAD 61 Combat Engagagements with Russian Forces Near Terny of Donetsk Region, Bilohorivka of Luhansk Region, Spirne, Ivano-Daryivka, Bohdanivka, Ivanivske, Kliske, Kliske. Chiyivka, Chasiv Yar of Donetsk Region, Berdychi, PervomaySke of Donetsk Region, Heorhiyivka, Novomykhaylivka, Velyka Novosilka, uroozhayne of Donetsk Region, Staromayrske of Donetsk Region and North -West Verbove of Zaporizhzhia, Krynky of Kherson Region, Genereal Staff of Armed Forces of Ukra in the says in the event report
author: Live UA Map
